EClass.Presentation.LayerObject

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • EClass.Presentation.LayerObject.LayerObject
      • EClass.Presentation.LayerObject.Rectangle

  • public abstract class Rectangle
extends LayerObject
    Rectangle is a LayerObject representing the geometric shape rectangle.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double height
      The height extends along the y axis when the rectangle has 0 rotation.
      (package private) double length
      The length extends along the x axis when the rectangle has 0 rotation.
